results.definition: (with `in') guardianship over; in divorce cases it is the right to house and care for and discipline a child
examples: my fate is in your hands
too much power in the president's hands
your guests are now in my custody
the mother was awarded custody of the children

results.definition: the (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
examples: he had the hands of a surgeon
he extended his mitt

results.definition: a hired laborer on a farm or ranch
examples: the hired hand fixed the railing
a ranch hand
she recognized his handwriting
his hand was illegible
he wanted to try his hand at singing

results.definition: a position given by its location to the side of an object
examples: objections were voiced on every hand

results.definition: the cards held in a card game by a given player at any given time
examples: I didn't hold a good hand all evening
he kept trying to see my hand

results.definition: one of two sides of an issue
examples: on the one hand..., but on the other hand...

results.definition: a rotating pointer on the face of a timepiece
examples: the big hand counts the minutes

results.definition: a unit of length equal to 4 inches; used in measuring horses
examples: the horse stood 20 hands

results.definition: a member of the crew of a ship
examples: all hands on deck

results.definition: a card player in a game of bridge
examples: we need a 4th hand for bridge

results.definition: a round of applause to signify approval
examples: give the little lady a great big hand

results.definition: terminal part of the forelimb in certain vertebrates (e.g. apes or kangaroos)
examples: the kangaroo's forearms seem undeveloped but the powerful five-fingered hands are skilled at feinting and clouting"- Springfield (Mass.) Union
give me a hand with the chores

results.definition: place into the hands or custody of
examples: hand me the spoon, please
Turn the files over to me, please
He turned over the prisoner to his lawyers

results.definition: guide or conduct or usher somewhere
examples: hand the elderly lady into the taxi
